How did you put into practice the script: Ubufumene njani iSibhalo / ibali esilifundileyo ngalolo xesha sidibana nalo?
Who did you share last week's lesson wit: Unenxaxheba kweyiphi isifundo seveki ephelileyo kwaye yaya njani?
What needs did you meet in the community: Zeziphi iimfuno odibene nabo ekuhlaleni kwiveki ephelileyo?
Ask someone to read the passage one para: Cela umntu ukuba afunde isicatshulwa umhlathi welinye ixesha.
Have a group member tell it in their own: Yiba nelungu leqela elixela ngamazwi abo.
Ask the group if they added anything or: Cela iqela ukuba bongeza nantoni na okanye ishiye into ngaphandle.
When you finish with ALL paragraphs, ask: Xa ugqibile ngawo onke amaqendu, cela umntu kwiqela ukuba alibalise ibali lonke ngememori. Ngaba iqela lilungisa naziphi na iimpazamo.
If this passage is true, what behaviour: Ukuba le ndinyana iyinyani, yeyiphi indlela esifanele siyitshintshe kule veki?
Who will you tell this story to this wee: Ngubani oza kulixelela eli bali kule veki?
What needs can we meet in the community: Zeziphi iimfuno esinokudibana nabo ekuhlaleni kule veki?
Would you like to discover with your fri: Ngaba ungathanda ukufumana abahlobo bakho ukuba injani kwaye njani ukuba uphile njani?
Would you like to discover for yourself: Ngaba ungathanda ukufumana ngokwakho ukuba unjani kwaye njani ukuba uphile njani?
Most people like to make these discoveri: Uninzi lwabantu luthanda ukwenza ezi zinto zifunyanisiweyo kwiqela nabahlobo babo.
